title: The One That Got Away PT 1: She Wants To Test Her Husband's Loyalty
description:
The One That Got Away: it’s been years since you’ve seen them. You moved on with your life, but there’s that one person who you still consider as the “one who got away.” We’ll track them down and find out what’s going on in their life…and if they’re thinking of you, too!
In this case, she's not looking for her "one that got away." Instead, she wants to test her husband. She's wondering how he would react if his ex reached out to him. Is this a bad idea? We think so.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
